trans-unit.source: The title will be used as main header in detail view
Describe something about what your club offers
The name of the person who should be contacted in case of any questions
In which time frame(s) an interested person can call/visit the club's contact person
Which email address can be used to contact the club?
The website of this club to find more information.
How many members does this club currently have?
The city/location where this club in located
A more detailed description of this club
Define one or more FE Users, who is allowed to edit this club in FE.
You can define exactly one logo to this club
Assign some additional images, if you want
Set Facebook URL of this club
Set Twitter URL of this club
Set Instagram URL of this club
You can add some tags. That way this club will be found, if someone uses that tag in search.
Many cities are separated into districts. You can assign this club to such a district.
